subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Roman Kreuziger was dropped from the Tinkoff-Saxo team lineup for the Tour de France and will not be riding in support for Alberto Contador because of anomalies in his biological passport.
snippet: Roman Kreuziger was dropped from the Tinkoff-Saxo team lineup for the Tour de France and will not be riding in support for Alberto Contador because of anomalies in his biological passport.
